Only 24 teams in NBA history have won 8 consecutive road games, the Utah Jazz came became the 25th team to do it with a win tonight in Portland.

The 7 road wins in a row is tied for 3rd most all-time for the Jazz.

15 in 1995-96
10 in 2017-18

The 15 in a row is 2nd most ever
